item.title: Your Customers Don’t Care About JavaScript
item.description: Your customers do not care about the technology behind your app. What programming language, frameworks, libraries, or whatever tooling you’re using, they don’t care. They care about it providing them value and that it has certain characteristics. They want it to work. YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds of content accompanying my… Read More »Your Customers Don’t Care About JavaScript The post Your Customers Don’t Care About JavaScript appeared first on CodeOpinion.
